text: Scarlett Pomers (born November 28, 1988) is an American former child actress. She is also a singer and songwriter. She played Shanna Jensen in the movie Erin Brockovich and Naomi Wildman in Star Trek: Voyager. She also played Kyra in the sitcom Reba. While acting for the show Reba, Pomers had an eating disorder. Pomers was born near Riverside, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from California Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Riverside County, California Category:People from Riverside, California
title: Scarlett Pomers
